Wine AppDB xmlexport

0.1

Introduction

Welcome to Wine AppDB xmlexport script page. This script provides xml view interface for Wine AppDB database. Originally this script was created by Malakhov Alexey aka John Brezerk for q4wine project. Current licese is GPL v3.

All trademarks and copyrights on this page are owned by their respective owners. The Rest (c) 1997-2010 BrezBlock.

Installation

First of all you need to edit cfg/config.inc file to make it work.

Warning:
Plase do not give write database access to this script.
Note:
You can disable user-agent check just by commenting out $white_agents[0] variable in cfg/config.inc file.
See also:
cfg/config.inc
